mutants.original_line: distances = {node: 0 if node == start else sys.maxsize for node in graph}
mutants.mutated_line: distances = {node: 0 if node != start else sys.maxsize for node in graph}

mutants.original_line: distances = {node: 0 if node == start else sys.maxsize for node in graph}
mutants.mutated_line: distances = {node: 1 if node == start else sys.maxsize for node in graph}

mutants.original_line: distances = {node: 0 if node == start else sys.maxsize for node in graph}
mutants.mutated_line: distances = {node: -1 if node == start else sys.maxsize for node in graph}

mutants.original_line: distances = {node: 0 if node == start else sys.maxsize for node in graph}
mutants.mutated_line: distances = {node: 1 if node == start else sys.maxsize for node in graph}
